review: It was good experience.we were at Hospital and went on well. Dr Gayathri Karthik was refereed the NT Scan

******* ******* talk less but very understanding, she ask about u without fail, lesion you carefully, always on time never have to wait for her.All question you ask she well reply, understand pregnant women worry and specially first pregnancy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: She surely do have lot of expertise in this field. But we had a really bad experience while went to her for growth scan. We found her very rude, she suddenly came & just stopped the previous doctors examination which she was doing in detail. She should have provided little more time & enough explanation on the scan results & a bit of empathy to attend to patients queries. She just wanted to finish the scan as quickly as possible & move to next patients.
Doctor is very cool and do scan very well without hurry. Shows scan screen in clear. Very impressed. Thank you.....
